message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $15,000. Let me know your thoughts!
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I understand its value to you, but I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. Could we possibly come to an agreement at this price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $15,000 is closer to my bottom line.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $12,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I am still unable to meet at $12,500. Would you consider $11,000 as a fair offer?
